content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'mundra_ct04')  

    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [mundra_ct04]  

    WITH ( 

        LOCATION   = 'https://navispowerbidatastorage2.dfs.core.windows.net/mundra_ct04',  

    ) 

Go 
SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources
Drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [mundra_ct04] 

create or alter view stack_confirmity
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/stack_confirmity',
        data_source = 'mundra_ct04',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [stack_confirmity];

create view dual_cycling
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/dual_cycling',
        data_source = 'tauranga',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [dual_cycling];
